content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The apartment is in great condition, right in the city center. How does 1500 Euros sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
While the apartment location is attractive, I believe we can find a more suitable agreement. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the current proposed price is higher than what I expect to pay for an unfurnished one-bedroom in this area.

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
